column4: I would really rather not have to go back to a super old version to get this laptop working. Any ideas?
we are here to help you to help us to help you

A bug that has lived through at least 10.04 and 10.10 is a complete nonstarter for this laptop. It seems to be some variation of this bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/lucid/+source/xorg/+bug/561802
